channel.title: Strategy Game InDev 0.2
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/7467/clip0306.gif[/img][/center]
Updated: 12/2/12
- Accelerated Graphics on an Applet with a Canvas - Single player - ENTITIES: are given sprites, coordinates, and other identifiers - All images are cached upon retrieval - Full Dialogue and KeyInput Handlers (video) - Player Entity added with walking and animation (video) - Npc Entities added and given names, levels, hps, ids, and sprite sets. - Maps added - sidebar interface added(simple) - hovering added, with npc info displaying on sidebar interface on hover (video) - Item Entities Added (video) - left click, and right click drop down see-through menus (video) - pre-pickup Item and pre-attack - Fading (video)
[b]First Video: 11/26/12[/b] [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2vl3yxj&s=6]Video - TinyPic - Free Image Hosting, Photo Sharing & Video Hosting[/url]
[b]Player Entity: Saul's Crazy Legs - 11/26/12 (later that night) (Skip to 30)[/b] [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2lj6qmv&s=6]Video - TinyPic - Free Image Hosting, Photo Sharing & Video Hosting[/url]
[b]Npc Entities, Maps, sidebar, and hovering - 11/29/12 (Again, you can skip to 30)[/b] [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=znkmes&s=6]Video - TinyPic - Free Image Hosting, Photo Sharing & Video Hosting[/url]
[b]Item Entities, finished pre-pickup and pre-attack, right click alpha menus and fade - 12/2/2012 (Got rid of the pre-game monologue, so no need to skip from here on)[/b] [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=10pqanc&s=6]Video - TinyPic - Free Image Hosting, Photo Sharing & Video Hosting[/url]
ATTENTION: Looking for skilled pixel artists. PM me if interested.

item.title: Strategy Game InDev 0.2

item.description:
@Nick6 wrote:

[center][/center]

Updated: 12/2/12

  • Accelerated Graphics on an Applet with a Canvas
  • Single player
  • ENTITIES: are given sprites, coordinates, and other identifiers
  • All images are cached upon retrieval
  • Full Dialogue and KeyInput Handlers (video)
  • Player Entity added with walking and animation (video)
  • Npc Entities added and given names, levels, hps, ids, and sprite sets.
  • Maps added
  • sidebar interface added(simple)
  • hovering added, with npc info displaying on sidebar interface on hover (video)
  • Item Entities Added (video)
  • left click, and right click drop down see-through menus (video)
  • pre-pickup Item and pre-attack
  • Fading (video)
